org.pepstock.charba.client

Class Defaults

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.Defaults

  • public final class Defaults
extends Object
    This singleton is a wrapper to defaults object that CHART.JS (by CHART object) provides to get defaults values.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Defaults.InternalDefaultScale
      Internal typed scale which is used to read the default scale by type.
      It has been implemented in order to store the axis type, mandatory for whatever operation with a scale.
      private static class  Defaults.InternalDefaultScales
      Internal class for default scales.
      private static class  Defaults.NativeChartHandler
      Internal plugin to track native chart instances on all charts.
      private static class  Defaults.WrapperDefaults
      It wraps the defaults object of CHART.JS chart instance.
      It returns the scale and chart options.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private Defaults()
      To avoid any instantiation.
      This gets from other objects (by static references) the defaults of CHART.JS.

      (package private) ChartOptions getChartOptions(Type type)
      Returns the default options by a chart type, for a existing chart instance.
      It contains:
      global options scale global options chart global options
      Controllers getControllers()
      Returns the controllers.
      GlobalOptions getGlobal()
      Returns the global options.
      ChartOptions getOptions(Type type)
      Returns the default options by a chart type, by defaults of CHART.JS.
      If the type is not consistent, throws an exception.
      GlobalPlugins getPlugins()
      Returns the global plugins manager.
      GlobalScale getScale()
      Returns the global scale.
      Scale getScale(AxisType axisType)
      Returns the global scale by axis type.

      Invokes the event chart function provided out of the box by CHART.JS.

      Invokes the onLeave legend function provided out of the box by CHART.JS.
      String invokeTooltipsCallbackOnLabel(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns the default text to render for an individual item in the tooltip.
      TooltipLabelColor invokeTooltipsCallbackOnLabelColor(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns the default colors to render for the tooltip item.

      Returns the default point style to render for the tooltip item.
      List<String> invokeTooltipsCallbackOnTitle(IsChart chart, List<TooltipItem> items)
      Returns the default text to render as the title of the tooltip.
      private DatasetElementOptions retrieveDatasetElementOptions(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns a set of predefined style properties that should be used to represent the data set or the data if the index is specified.

      • getChartOptions

        ChartOptions getChartOptions(Type type)
        Returns the default options by a chart type, for a existing chart instance.
        It contains:
        • global options
        • scale global options
        • chart global options
        Parameters:
        type - chart type.
        Returns:
        the chart options instance

      • getOptions

        public ChartOptions getOptions(Type type)
        Returns the default options by a chart type, by defaults of CHART.JS.
        If the type is not consistent, throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        type - chart type.
        Returns:
        the default options or throws an exception if type is not consistent.

      • generateLabels

        public List<LegendLabelItem> generateLabels(Chart chart)
        Returns an unmodifiable list of legend labels for that chart with the callback provided by CHART.JS out of the box.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance to use to get legend labels
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of legend labels or an empty list if chart is not initialized.

      • generateLabels

        public List<LegendLabelItem> generateLabels(IsChart chart)
        Returns an unmodifiable list of legend labels for that chart with the callback provided by CHART.JS out of the box.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance to use to get legend labels
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of legend labels or an empty list if chart is not initialized.

      • invokeTooltipsCallbackOnTitle

        public List<String> invokeTooltipsCallbackOnTitle(IsChart chart,
                                                  List<TooltipItem> items)
        Returns the default text to render as the title of the tooltip.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        items - list of all tooltip items
        Returns:

        item - tooltip item
        Returns:

                                                            TooltipItem item)

        item - tooltip item
        Returns:

      • retrieveDatasetElementOptions

        private DatasetElementOptions retrieveDatasetElementOptions(IsChart chart,
                                                            TooltipItem item)
        Returns a set of predefined style properties that should be used to represent the data set or the data if the index is specified.
        Parameters:

        item - tooltip item
